survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Wellness Amenities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on current workplace wellness amenities and identify areas for improvement to enhance overall job satisfaction and well-being.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the on-site wellness amenities (e.g., gym, meditation room, wellness programs)?
